revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #39 Wacan |image = [[File:Wacan.png]] |caption = Energy from lightning strikes is drawn into the plant, making the Berries grow big and rich. The same energy promotes the growth of nearby Berries. |growtime = 30m 0s |harvest = 2 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 250 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *15 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Wacan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Iapapa]], at least 1 [[Qualot]], at least 1 [[Pinap]] and at least 1 [[Grepa]]. Various [[Farming Setups]] using Wacan can be found [[Farming Setups#Wacan|here]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 10 secs || 3 mins || 15 mins || 30 mins - 1 hour |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WacanTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WacanTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WacanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (growth rate) | ||
x1.1 ||
x1.2 ||
x1.3 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 30 mins -
1 hour || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 20 mins -
40 mins || 4 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 13 mins 20 secs-
26 mins 40 secs || 3 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Wacan_Flow_Chart.png|400px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Wacan berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] |- | [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |- | [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' !
